name: Farewell - Undefined
description:
Do you find Celeste's last level too hard and impossible...? Do you always die from screens like Keyskip, Sawmill, Autoscroller,combroom, Windsprings or Chokefish?

Here I have a nerfed version with a few completely reworked rooms of Farewell that expects to make gameplay much more beginnerfriendly.
Other than  Jelly regrabs and Dreamjumps shouldnt be required if you find any things odd or stupid feel free to reach me out on Celestecord. #puzzle #multiplayer #arcade
